idha saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ odahati, ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhati,
passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṃ na dadanti mohā. luddhā dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti, bhiyyo'va kāme abhipatthayanti.

sbs_example_4: evam'eva kho, bhikkhave, kull'ūpamaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nittharaṇ'atthāya, no gahaṇ'atthāya.

sbs_example_4: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya mā nimittaggāhī hohi m'ānubyañjanaggāhī.

sbs_example_4: anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati

sbs_example_3: phuṭṭhassa lokadhammehi, cittaṃ yassa na kampati. asokaṃ virajaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
sbs_example_4: sabbe dhammā anattā'ti, yadā paññāya passati. atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā.

sbs_example_3: katame ca bhikkhave satta aparihāniyā dhammā?
sbs_example_4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, na'y'idha paññāyetha mātā'ti vā mātucchā'ti vā mātulānī'ti vā ācariyabhariyā'ti vā garūnaṃ dārā'ti vā. sambhedaṃ loko agamissa, yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.

sbs_example_3: uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā, nava paṭham'āpattikā cattāro yāvatatiyakā.

sbs_example_3: yo sāsanaṃ arahataṃ, ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ, paṭikkosati dummedho, diṭṭhiṃ nissāya pāpikaṃ, phalāni kaṭṭhakass'eva, attaghātāya phallati.
sa ve samm'addaso bhikkhu, parijānāti vedanā. so vedanā pariññāya, diṭṭhe dhamme anāsavo. kāyassa bhedā dhammaṭṭho, saṅkhyaṃ n'opeti vedagū'ti.
seyyathā'pi gāvī taruṇavacchā thambañ'ca ālumpati vacchakañ'ca apacinati. evam'eva kho dhammatā esā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa
kathañ'ca, bhikkhave, ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca, no ca dhammadesanā?
asukasmiṃ nāma āvāse sambahulā therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgat'āgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā. tesaṃ me therānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ
ayaṃ kho so, bhikkhave, nibbedhikapariyāyo dhammapariyāyo'ti
ekadā dhammarājā pi gelaññen'ābhipīḷito cundattherena taññ'eva bhaṇāpetvāna sādaraṃ sammoditvā ca ābādhā tamhā vuṭṭhāsi ṭhānaso.
bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattam'pi, tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī.
gāravo ca nivāto ca, santuṭṭhi ca kataññutā. kālena dhammassavanaṃ, etaṃ maṅgalam'uttamaṃ.
sbs_example_4: kālena dhammassavanaṃ, kālena dhammasākacchā, kālena sammasanā, kālena vipassanā, ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro kālā sammā bhāviyamānā sammā anuparivattiyamānā anupubbena āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpenti.

sbs_example_3: dhammavādī c'eso bhikkhu vinayavādī c'eso bhikkhu amhākañ'c'eso bhikkhu chandañ'ca ruciñ'ca ādāya voharati, jānāti no bhāsati amhākam'p'etaṃ khamatī'ti
bojjh'aṅgo satisaṅkhāto dhammānaṃ vicayo tathā viriyam'pītipassaddhi bojjh'aṅgā ca tathā'pare samādh'upekkhabojjh'aṅgā.
sbs_example_4: paṭisaṅkhā yoniso dhammavicayasambojjh'aṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.

sbs_example_3: paṭisaṅkhā yoniso dhammavicayasambojjh'aṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
so tehi dhammavitakkehi divasaṃ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṃ, n'ānuyuñjati ajjhattaṃ cetosamathaṃ.
sakkā nu kho, bho gotama, imasmim'pi dhammavinaye evam'eva anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā paññapetun'ti
sbs_example_4: yo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye, appamatto vihassati. pahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ, dukkhass'antaṃ karissati.

sbs_example_3: dhamm'ānusārī idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā te na kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya c'assa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
sbs_example_4: dhamm'ānusārī … tathāgatappaveditā c'assa dhammā paññāya mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamanti, api c'assa ime dhammā honti, seyyath'idaṃ, saddh'indriyaṃ, vīriy'indriyaṃ, sat'indriyaṃ, samādh'indriyaṃ, paññ'indriyaṃ.

sbs_example_3: bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattam'pi, tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī.
sbs_example_4: sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasāvako uṭṭhānavīriy'ādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sed'āvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi imāni cattāri pattakammāni kattā hoti.

sbs_example_3: āyasmā ānando tā bhikkhuniyo dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyaāsanā pakkāmi
āyasmā ānando tā bhikkhuniyo dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāy'āsanā pakkāmi
idaṃ vadāmī'ti na tassa hoti, dhammesu niccheyya samuggahītaṃ, passañ'ca diṭṭhīsu anuggahāya, ajjhattasantiṃ pacinaṃ adassaṃ.
asukasmiṃ nāma āvāse sambahulā therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgat'āgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā. tesaṃ me therānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ
sbs_example_4: bahussuto nu kho'mhi sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti.

sbs_example_3: yathā paccayaṃ pavattamānaṃ dhātumattam'ev'etaṃ, yad idaṃ piṇḍapāto tad upabhuñjako ca puggalo, dhātumattako nissatto nijjīvo suñño,
vandāmi cetiyaṃ sabbaṃ ‒ sabbaṭhānesu patiṭṭhitaṃ, sārīrikadhātumahābodhiṃ ‒ buddharūpaṃ sakalaṃ sadā
cakkhu'ndriyassa sot'indriyassa ghān'indriyassa jivh'indriyassa kāy'indriyassa. atthi, bhikkhave, mano, atthi dhammā, atthi avijjādhātu.
asītivassasahass'āyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ayaṃ jambudīpo iddho c'eva bhavissati phīto ca, kukkuṭasampātikā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo.
ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati
na dakkhiṇāya disāya udakassa āyamukhaṃ, devo ca na kālena kālaṃ sammādhāraṃ anuppaveccheyya.
yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo, ayaṃ te, bhikkhu, patto, yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo'ti.
seyyathā'pi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya
ek'aṃsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi, eso dhammo, eso vinayo, etaṃ satthusāsanan'ti
sbs_example_4: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhadd'ekarattassa uddesañ'ca vibhaṅgañ'ca.

sbs_example_3: hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṃ'y'eva disaṃ dhāvati, puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā.
na so satto sulabharūpo, yo na mātābhūtapubbo, yo na pitābhūtapubbo, yo na bhātā, yo na bhaginī, yo na putto, yo na dhītābhūtapubbā'ti

sbs_example_3: seyyathā'pi rañño paccantime nagare bahubalakāyo paṭivasati, evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako āraddhavīriyo viharati, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.

sbs_example_4: ettako'pi kho, bhikkhu, attabhāvapaṭilābho n'atthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tath'eva ṭhassati.

sbs_example_4: indriyesu guttadvārā bhavissāma, bhojane mattaññuno, jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā, vipassakā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, pubbaratt'āpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ, bhāvan'ānuyogam'anuyuttā viharissāmā'ti.

sbs_example_3: bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle

asantaṃ yo paggaṇhāti, asantaṃ c'ūpasevati, tam'eva ghāsaṃ kurute, byaggho sañjīvako yathā'ti.
anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṃ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāyā'ti sikkhā karaṇīyā.

seyyathā'pi dovāriko hoti paṇḍito byatto medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretā ñātānaṃ pavesetā, evam'evaṃ kho ariyasāvako satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatam'pi cirabhāsitam'pi saritā anussaritā.

dv'āhaṃ sakkaṃ apucchissaṃ, na me byākāsi cakkhumā, yāvatatiyañ'ca dev'īsi, byākarotī'ti me sutaṃ.
āyām'āvuso, yena bhagavā ten'upasaṅkamissāma. upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etam'atthaṃ ārocessāma. yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā'ti.
byādhidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino. yathā dhammā tathā sattā, jigucchanti puthujjanā.
kārako kārakatāya vādaṃ upeti, atha vā vuccamāno upavadiyamāno kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhiyati kopañ'ca dosañ'ca appaccayañ'ca pātukaroti.
taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gāmaṇi, idh'assa puriso pāṇ'ātipātī adinn'ādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī pisuṇavāco pharusavāco samphappalāpī abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko.

sbs_example_4: sace tvaṃ, rāhula, paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jāneyyāsi, yaṃ kho ahaṃ idaṃ kāyena kammaṃ kattu'kāmo idaṃ me kāyakammaṃ attabyābādhāya'pi saṃvatteyya

ehi sārathi gacchāhi, rathaṃ niyyādayāh'imaṃ, ārogyaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ vajja, pabbaji dāni brāhmaṇo, sujāto tīhi rattīhi, tisso vijjā aphassayi.

dehi je ambapāli amhākaṃ etaṃ bhattaṃ satasahassenā'ti.

sbs_example_4: kassapassa vaco sutvā, alāto etadabravi. yathā bhadanto bhaṇati, mayham'p'etaṃ'va ruccati.

sbs_example_3: ahaṃ bhadante ahuvāsi pubbe, sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvako. puthujjano ananubodhohamasmi, so satta vassāni paribbajissahaṃ.
evaṃ vihārim'ātāpiṃ, ahorattam'atanditaṃ. taṃ ve bhadd'ekaratto'ti, santo ācikkhate muni.
bhaddakā vat'ime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vat'ime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me na'y'ime pāṇinā pahāraṃ dentī'ti.
ayaṃ diṭṭhi bhaddikā'ti sayaṃ samattaṃ karoti paripuṇṇaṃ karoti anomaṃ karoti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ karoti.
nihacca jāṇuṃ vanditvā, sammukhā añjaliṃ akaṃ, ehi bhadde'ti maṃ avaca, sā me ās'ūpasampadā.
ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati
sbs_example_4: ko nu kho, bho bhāradvāja, hetu ko paccayo yen'ime daharā bhikkhū susu kāḷakesā bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatā

sbs_example_3: ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavā hohi, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharāhi ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesū'ti

sbs_example_3: mataṃ me jīvitā seyyaṃ, tasmā araññaṃ pavisitvā ubbandhitvā marissāmī'ti araññaṃ gato maraṇabhayatajjito paṭinivatti.
kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ añña'd'atthu bhayapaṭikaṅkhī viharāmi? yaṃnūn'āhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ yathābhūtassa me taṃ bhayabheravaṃ āgacchati, tathābhūtaṃ tathābhūtova taṃ bhayabheravaṃ paṭivineyyan'ti

pabbajitaṃ pana mahāgovindaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ satta ca rājāno khattiyā muddh'āvasittā satta ca brāhmaṇamahāsālā satta ca nhātakasatāni cattārīsā ca bhariyā sādisiyo anekāni ca khattiyasahassāni ... anupabbajiṃsu.

sbs_example_3: seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, puriso kāḷakaṃ vatthaṃ paridhāya kese pakiritvā bhasmapuṭaṃ khandhe āropetvā mahājanakāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
sabb'ītiyo vivajjantu, sabbarogo vinassatu, mā te bhavatv'antarāyo, sukhī dīgh'āyuko bhava.
khīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ navaṃ n'atthi sambhavaṃ, virattacitt'āyatike bhavasmiṃ. te khīṇabījā avirūḷhichandā, nibbanti dhīrā yath'āyaṃ padīpo.
sbs_example_4: katamañ'ca dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ? yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatr'ābhinandinī. seyyath'idaṃ, kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā.

sbs_example_3: ye ariyasaccāni vibhāvayanti, gambhīrapaññena sudesitāni. kiñ'c'āpi te honti bhusaṃ pamattā, na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamam'ādiyanti.

sbs_chant_eng_2: Setting in Motion The Wheel of Dhamma

sbs_example_4: ye keci sokā paridevitā vā, dukkhā ca lokasmim'anekarūpā. piyaṃ paṭiccappabhavanti ete, piye asante na bhavanti ete.

sbs_example_3: na arahati bhavaṃ kūṭadanto samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ. samaṇo tv'eva gotamo arahati bhavantaṃ kūṭadantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ
sace pan'āyaṃ kulaputto mah'āyo samāno kasiraṃ jīvikaṃ kappeti, tassa bhavanti vattāro, ajaddhumārikaṃ v'āyaṃ kulaputto marissatī'ti
es'ev'anto mān'ānusayānaṃ, es'ev'anto bhavarāg'ānusayānaṃ, es'ev'anto avijj'ānusayānaṃ
ye pana te bhikkhū arahanto khīṇ'āsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā samma'd'aññāvimuttā
sacc'ānurakkhaṇaṃ mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ apucchimha, sacc'ānurakkhaṇaṃ bhavaṃ gotamo byākāsi
na kho mayaṃ passāma bhoto gotamassa yugaṃ vā naṅgalaṃ vā phālaṃ vā pācanaṃ vā balībadde vā, atha ca pana bhavaṃ gotamo evam'āha
sbs_example_4: ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yaṁ tiṭṭhateva nibbānaṁ, tiṭṭhati nibbānagāmī maggo, tiṭṭhati bhavaṁ gotamo samādapetā

sbs_example_3: tasmā hi paññā'va dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānam'idh'ādhigacchati. abyositattā hi bhav'ābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā.
sbs_example_4: sūrakathaṃ visikhākathaṃ kumbhaṭṭhānakathaṃ pubbapetakathaṃ nānattakathaṃ lok'akkhāyikaṃ samudd'akkhāyikaṃ itibhav'ābhavakathaṃ

sbs_example_3: yassa dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vā bhav'āsavo na uppajjati, uppanno vā bhav'āsavo pahīyati.
parisuddho no kāyasamācāro bhavissati uttāno vivaṭo na ca chiddavā saṃvuto ca.

yaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
uyyuñjanti satīmanto, na nikete ramanti te, haṃsā'va pallalaṃ hitvā, okam'okaṃ jahanti te.
etā pi buddhajayamaṅgalaaṭṭhagāthā, yo vācano dinadine sarate'm'atandī, hitvān'anekavividhāni c'upaddavāni, mokkhaṃ sukhaṃ adhigameyya naro sapañño
rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anattā. rūpañ'ca h'idaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, na'y'idaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe, evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti.
sbs_chant_eng_3: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self
sbs_example_4: na dīgham'āyuṃ labhate dhanena, na c'āpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti. appaṃ h'idaṃ jīvitam'āhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.

sbs_example_3: tena hi tvaṃ mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā sakaṭehi nibbāhāpetvā majjhe gaṅgāya sote osādehi.
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍaṃsamakasavāt'ātapasiriṃsapasamphassānaṃ paṭighātāya yāva'd'eva hirikopīnapaṭicchādan'atthaṃ
sbs_example_4: hirīnisedho puriso, koci lokasmi vijjati, yo nindaṃ apabodheti, asso bhadro kasām'iva.

sbs_example_3: hirīmatā ca dujjīvaṃ, niccaṃ sucigavesinā, alīnenaappagabbhena, suddhājīvena passatā.
sbs_example_4: hirīmā'yaṃ, bhikkhave, ottāpī appamatto hoti. so appamatto samāno bhabbo anādariyaṃ pahātuṃ dovacassataṃ pahātuṃ pāpamittataṃ pahātuṃ.

sbs_example_3: seyyathā'pi usabho chinnavisāṇo sūrato sudanto suvinīto rathiyāya rathiyaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ anvāhiṇḍanto na kiñci hiṃsati pādena vā visāṇena vā
sbs_example_4: na ca me hiṃsati kiñci, na ca'haṃ isidāsiyā saha vacchaṃ, dessāva me alaṃ me, āpucch'āhaṃ gamissāmi.

sbs_example_3: tath'eva isayo hiṃsaṃ, saññame brahmacārino, adhammacārī khattiyo, so saggena virujjhati.
na, bhikkhave, hīnena aggassa patti hoti. aggena ca kho, bhikkhave, aggassa patti hoti.
sbs_example_4: tasmā't'iha, bhikkhave, yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atīt'ānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā
sbs_chant_eng_4: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self

sbs_example_3: yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, kusīto hīnavīriyo, ek'āhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, vīriyam'ārabhato daḷhaṃ.
sbs_example_4: kusītā hīnavīriyā muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā duppaññā eḷamūgā,

sbs_example_3: maraṇañ'h'etaṃ, sunakkhatta, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāy'āvattati, maraṇamattañ'h'etaṃ, sunakkhatta, dukkhaṃ yaṃ aññataraṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
so sace ākaṅkhati, anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhaveyyaṃ, eko'pi hutvā bahudhā assaṃ, bahudhā'pi hutvā eko assaṃ, āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ
sbs_example_4: kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ atītam'addhānaṃ? kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītam'addhānaṃ? bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatam'addhānaṃ?

sbs_example_3: yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā, saggesu vā yaṃ ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ. na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatena
aññataro bhikkhu heṭṭhā hutvā silaṃ uccāresi. uparimena bhikkhunā duggahitā silā heṭṭhimassa bhikkhuno matthake avatthāsi. so bhikkhu kālamakāsi
yaṃ pan'āniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ, etaṃ mama, eso'ham'asmi, eso me attā'ti? no h'etaṃ, bhante.
sbs_chant_eng_3: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self
sbs_example_4: iti h'etaṃ vijānāma, navamo so parābhavo. dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ.

sbs_example_3: yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya, āmisahetu bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī'ti, pācittiyaṃ.
taṃ kissa hetu? tathārūpānaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dvayena vūpakāsena vūpakaṭṭho viharati, kāyavūpakāsena ca cittavūpakāsena ca.
sbs_example_4: asādhāraṇena ca ñāṇena samannāgato bhavissāmi, hetu ca me sudiṭṭho bhavissati, hetusamuppannā ca dhammā.

sbs_example_3: honti h'ete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
evaṃ utuācikkhanaṃ. utūn'īdha pana sāsane hem'antagimhavassānānaṃ vasena tīṇi honti.
na h'eva kho pana paṭicchannaṃ āsanaṃ hoti, n'ālaṃkammaniyaṃ, alañ'ca kho hoti mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsituṃ
sbs_example_4: pupphāni h'eva pacinantaṃ, byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ, suttaṃ gāmaṃ mah'ogho'va, maccu ādāya gacchati.

sbs_example_3: disvā samudayaṃ vibhavañ'ca sambhavaṃ, dāy'ādako hehisi aggavādino.
ye puggalā aṭṭha sataṃ pasatthā, cattāri etāni yugāni honti. te dakkhiṇeyyā sugatassa sāvakā, etesu dinnāni mahapphalāni.
sbs_example_4: kassako kammunā hoti, sippiko hoti kammunā. vāṇijo kammunā hoti, pessako hoti kammunā.

sbs_example_3: idam'pi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ. etena saccena suvatthi hotu.
sbs_example_4: rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anattā. rūpañ'ca h'idaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, na'y'idaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe, evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti.
sbs_chant_eng_4: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self

sbs_chant_eng_2: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self
sbs_example_3: brahmamārā ca indā ca lokapālā ca devatā, yamo, mittā manussā ca majjhattā verikā'pi ca, sabbe sattā sukhī hontu.
amatamhi vijjamāne, kiṃ tava pañcakaṭukena pītena, sabbā hi kāmaratiyo, kaṭukatarā pañcakaṭukena.

sbs_chant_eng_1: Setting in Motion The Wheel of Dhamma

sbs_example_4: atītaṃ n'ānvāgameyya, nappaṭikaṅkhe anāgataṃ, yad'atītam'pahīnan'taṃ, appattañ'ca anāgataṃ.

sbs_example_3: yaṃ buddhaseṭṭho parivaṇṇayī suciṃ, samādhim'ānantarikañ'ñam'āhu, samādhinā tena samo na vijjati
khayaṃ virāgaṃ amataṃ paṇītaṃ, yad'ajjhagā sakyamunī samāhito. na tena dhammena sam'atthi kiñci
na dīgham'āyuṃ labhate dhanena, na c'āpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti. appaṃ h'idaṃ jīvitam'āhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.
app'evanām'imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā'ti
kumbh'ūpamaṃ kāyam'imaṃ viditvā, nagar'ūpamaṃ cittam'idaṃ ṭhapetvā. yodhetha māraṃ paññ'āvudhena, jitañ'ca rakkhe anivesano siyā.
